dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent failed to identify the root cause related to CM and DDR causing VCORE frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain from CM to CPU to DDR to VCORE was not captured.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Some metrics like VCORE and DDR percentages were identified, but CPU frequencies were missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was basic and lacked depth, failing to rule out or identify MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: Suggested actions were generic and lacked specific historical fixes or recommendations.
